content: We are wondering if NutritionOrder should contain information on the materials used or needed to perform the NutrionOrder. Think for example about adjusted utensils, dinner flatware and specialized mocks. For example with a reference to a Device. Any thoughts or use-cases on this matter?

@Ardon Toonstra Hi, we recently added adaptive feeding device concept domain to our V3 nutrition model work, so it would make sense to add a reference to device for NutritionOrder here too. Do you want to add a Gforge tracker item for this?
I would think this may be an extension for now.
@Margaret Dittloff and Eric, thanks for the input. I made tracker ID: 13475
